STI_DOC.P: ROAD REHABILITATION AND SAFETY PROJECT (RRSP) IBRD Project ID No. P127876, IBRD Loan No. 8255-YF EIB Loan No. 82.640

PREPARATION OF MAIN DESIGNS FOR HEAVY MAINTENANCE (ROAD REHABILITATION-UPGRADING) OF THE STATE ROAD IB 29: LOT 1: SECTION: STAVALJ - SUSICA, L=9.015 KM AND LOT 2: SECTION: SUSICA - DOJEVICE, L=26.700 KM
CONTRACT AWARD NOTICE
Republic of Serbia

CONTENTS.P: Selection was conducted through the Quality and Cost Based Selection (QCBS) method as stated under the relevant World Bank’s Guidelines: Selection and Employment of Consultants under IBRD Loans and IDA Credits and Grants by World Bank Borrowers issued in January 2011.
On 28.12.2016, Request for Proposal was sent to the following 6 consultants in accordance with the Consultants’ Short List approved by the European Investment Bank on 21.12.2016:
JV Project Biro UTIBER d.o.o., Serbia (JV leading partner)
JV Highway Institute JSC, Serbia (JV leader)
JV AIC Progetti S.p.A., Italy (JV leader)
JV CPS Ingenieros S.L., Spain (JV leader)
JV Técnica y Proyectos, S.A. (TYPSA), Spain (JV leader)
The overall technical scores and scores assigned for each criterion and sub-criterion to each consultant were the following:
01 JV NET Engineering S.p.A. and Hidroprojek at-saobracaj d.o.o.
02 JV Project Biro UTIBER d.o.o., UTIBER Kozuti Beruhazo Kft. and PANPRO TEAM d.o.o.
03 JV Highway Institute JSC and Via Projekt d.o.o.
04 JV AIC Progetti S.p.A. and Meridijanproj ekt (Saputnik-M DOO)
05 JV CPS Ingenieros S.L. and Geoput d.o.o.
The prices offered by each consultant as read out and as converted to currency of evaluation were as follows:
— JV NET Engineering S.p.A. and Hidroprojekat-saobracaj d.o.o.
— JV Project Biro UTIBER d.o.o., UTIBER Kozuti Beruhazo Kft. and PANPRO TEAM d.o.o.
— JV Highway Institute JSC and Via Projekt d.o.o.
— JV AIC Progetti S.p.A. and Meridijanprojekt (Saputnik-M DOO).
— JV CPS Ingenieros S.L. and Geoput d.o.o.
Final rank of the Consultants was as follows:
JV NET Engineering S.p.A. and Hidroprojekat-saobracaj d.o.o.
JV Project Biro UTIBER d.o.o., UTIBER Kozuti Beruhazo Kft. and PANPRO TEAM d.o.o.
JV Highway Institute JSC and Via Projekt d.o.o.
JV AIC Progetti S.p.A. and Meridijanprojekt (Saputnik-M DOO)
JV CPS Ingenieros S.L. and Geoput d.o.o.
Recommendation for the contract award went to the consultant with the highest combined technical and financial score.
Successful Consultant: JV NET Engineering S.p.A. and Hidroprojekat-saobracaj d.o.o.

Scope of Contract: Consulting Services for Preparation of Main Designs for Heavy Maintenance (Road Rehabilitation-Upgrading) of the State Road IB 29: Lot 1: Section: Stavalj — Susica, L=9.015 km and Lot 2: Section: Susica — Dojevice, L=26.700 km
Implementing Agency: Public Enterprise “Roads of Serbia”, Belgrade, Republic of Serbia.
